supported_vulnerabilities.name: Use of Broken Cryptographic Algorithms
supported_vulnerabilities.description: Deprecated encryption methods vulnerable to cryptanalytic attacks

supported_vulnerabilities.name: Buffer Overflow Write
supported_vulnerabilities.description: Memory corruption through writing beyond allocated buffer boundaries

supported_vulnerabilities.name: Cleartext Storage of Sensitive Information
supported_vulnerabilities.description: Unencrypted storage of passwords, keys, and other sensitive data

supported_vulnerabilities.name: Command Injection
supported_vulnerabilities.description: Execution of arbitrary system commands through unsanitized user input

supported_vulnerabilities.name: CORS Misconfiguration
supported_vulnerabilities.description: Improper cross-origin resource sharing policies enabling data theft

supported_vulnerabilities.name: Use of Cryptographically Weak PRNGs
supported_vulnerabilities.description: Predictable random number generators compromising token and key security

supported_vulnerabilities.name: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF)
supported_vulnerabilities.description: Unauthorized actions performed on behalf of authenticated users without consent

supported_vulnerabilities.name: Debug Features Enabled in Production
supported_vulnerabilities.description: Development functionality exposed in production revealing sensitive system information

supported_vulnerabilities.name: Insecure Deserialization
supported_vulnerabilities.description: Remote code execution through manipulation of serialized object data

supported_vulnerabilities.name: Hard-coded Credentials
supported_vulnerabilities.description: Authentication credentials embedded directly in source code or configuration

supported_vulnerabilities.name: Improper Authentication
supported_vulnerabilities.description: Inadequate authentication mechanisms enabling unauthorized access

supported_vulnerabilities.name: Improper Certificate Validation
supported_vulnerabilities.description: Insufficient validation of SSL/TLS certificates enabling man-in-the-middle attacks

supported_vulnerabilities.name: Improper Link Resolution
supported_vulnerabilities.description: Link following vulnerabilities enabling unauthorized file access

supported_vulnerabilities.name: Improper Memory Buffer Bounds
supported_vulnerabilities.description: Memory access beyond allocated buffer boundaries causing security vulnerabilities

supported_vulnerabilities.name: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements
supported_vulnerabilities.description: Insufficient sanitization of special characters enabling various injection attacks

supported_vulnerabilities.name: Improper Output Handling
supported_vulnerabilities.description: Inadequate handling of model outputs in LLM applications

supported_vulnerabilities.name: Incorrect Authorization
supported_vulnerabilities.description: Flawed authorization logic enabling unauthorized access to resources

supported_vulnerabilities.name: Insecure Direct Object References
supported_vulnerabilities.description: Direct access to objects without proper authorization checks

supported_vulnerabilities.name: Insufficient Key Length
supported_vulnerabilities.description: Cryptographic keys below current security standards enabling brute force attacks

supported_vulnerabilities.name: JWT Algorithm Confusion
supported_vulnerabilities.description: JSON Web Token signature bypass through algorithm manipulation attacks

supported_vulnerabilities.name: Missing Authentication for Critical Function
supported_vulnerabilities.description: Critical functions accessible without proper authentication

supported_vulnerabilities.name: Missing Authorization
supported_vulnerabilities.description: Insufficient authorization checks allowing unauthorized resource access

supported_vulnerabilities.name: Missing Security Headers
supported_vulnerabilities.description: Absent browser security controls enabling clickjacking and XSS attacks

supported_vulnerabilities.name: NoSQL Injection
supported_vulnerabilities.description: Query manipulation in NoSQL databases through unsanitized input

supported_vulnerabilities.name: Out of Bounds Read
supported_vulnerabilities.description: Reading data outside allocated memory boundaries

supported_vulnerabilities.name: Path Traversal
supported_vulnerabilities.description: Unauthorized file access through manipulated file paths and directory navigation

supported_vulnerabilities.name: Prompt Injection
supported_vulnerabilities.description: Manipulation of LLM prompts to bypass security controls

supported_vulnerabilities.name: Race Conditions
supported_vulnerabilities.description: Concurrent access vulnerabilities in shared resources causing security failures

supported_vulnerabilities.name: Sensitive Information Exposure
supported_vulnerabilities.description: Unintended disclosure of sensitive information to unauthorized parties

supported_vulnerabilities.name: Sensitive Information Disclosure
supported_vulnerabilities.description: Disclosure of sensitive information through LLM responses

supported_vulnerabilities.name: Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF)
supported_vulnerabilities.description: Unauthorized server-side requests to internal or external resources

supported_vulnerabilities.name: Server-Side Template Injection (SSTI)
supported_vulnerabilities.description: Template engine exploitation through user input enabling server-side code execution

supported_vulnerabilities.name: SQL Injection
supported_vulnerabilities.description: Malicious SQL code injection through unsanitized user input in database queries

supported_vulnerabilities.name: Use After Free
supported_vulnerabilities.description: Access to freed memory locations leading to crashes or code execution

supported_vulnerabilities.name: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS)
supported_vulnerabilities.description: Client-side script injection enabling session hijacking and content manipulation

supported_vulnerabilities.name: XML External Entity (XXE) Injection
supported_vulnerabilities.description: Server-side request forgery and file disclosure through malicious XML processing

metadata.description: Comprehensive vulnerability detection patterns for security testing
